How do I create an account: Click 'Sign Up' at the top of the page and fill in your details. Once submitted, you'll receive a confirmation email.
How do I log in?: Go to the login page and enter your registered email and password to access your account.
How to reset my password?: Click on 'Forgot Password?' on the login page and follow the steps to reset your password via email.
How do I update my account information?: Log in and go to 'My Account' > 'Account Settings' to update your name, email, password, and other details.
Is creating an account required to place: You can check out as a guest, but creating an account lets you track orders and manage your purchases more easily.
How can I track my order?: Once your order ships, we’ll email you a tracking number. You can also track it under 'My Orders' in your account.
Can I cancel or change my order after pl: We process orders quickly, but contact us ASAP. If the order hasn’t shipped, we’ll try to help.
How do I apply a promo code?: You can enter your promo code at checkout in the 'Discount Code' field before completing your payment.
What payment methods do you accept?: We accept major credit/debit cards, UPI, net banking, and popular wallets. Available options are shown at checkout.
Is it safe to shop on your website?: Yes, we use secure encryption and trusted payment gateways to protect your personal and payment information.
Do you offer cash on delivery (COD)?: Yes, COD is available on select orders. Availability depends on your location and the order value.
What are your shipping charges?: Shipping charges vary based on your location and order total. You’ll see the exact cost at checkout.
How long does delivery take?: Standard delivery usually takes 3–7 business days. Delivery times may vary based on location and product availability.
Do you ship internationally?: Currently, we only ship within [your country] — but we’re working on expanding soon!
What’s your return policy?: Most items can be returned within 7–15 days of delivery. Products must be unused and in original condition.
How do I request a return or exchange?: Log into your account, go to 'My Orders,' and click 'Return/Exchange' next to the item. Follow the instructions provided.
When will I receive my refund?: Refunds are usually processed within 5–7 business days after we receive and inspect the returned item.
Can I exchange an item for a different s: Yes, if the item is eligible for exchange and in stock. You can start the exchange process from your order history.
What if I receive a damaged or wrong ite: We're sorry! Please contact our support team within 48 hours of delivery with photos, and we’ll make it right.
How do I contact customer support?: You can reach us via live chat, email, or phone. Visit our 'Contact Us' page for full details.
Thank You: Glad to be of help! Please let us know if there's anything else that you'd like to ask.
